title: LED Node
description: Schema describing a single addressable LED node within an atlas graph.

id.description: Global node identifier within the atlas.

chunk_id.description: Identifier for the wiring chunk / strip segment the node belongs to.

index_in_chunk.description: Index of the node within its wiring chunk, used for debugging wiring continuity.

region.description: Semantic region name assigned by a human (e.g. hood_peak, lapel_left).

atlas_uv.description: Stable 2D parameterization for indexing and navigation.

neighbors.description: Neighboring node ids grouped by edge set.

strip.description: Adjacency in wiring order (direct electrical neighbors).

surface.description: Perceptual or geodesic proximity on the physical surface.

region.description: Semantic or manual groupings beyond wiring / surface adjacency.

tags.description: Freeform labels for search and navigation.

description.description: Human-readable notes about the node (placement, visibility, etc.).

confidence.description: Confidence score for the node placement or region attribution.

camera_observations.description: Raw camera detections that informed this node's placement.
